name: Black Works Studio - Boondock Saints - Robusto
additionalNotes: Black Works Studio The Boondock Saint Robusto is definitely a premium cigar not for the faint of heart!  This high-octane small batch offering from the famous Black Label Trading Company in Nicaragua, features a dark and oily Broadleaf wrapper over a Cuban-seed Nicaraguan Habano binder, and aged fillers from Nicaragua and Pennsylvania. Once lit, you can expect hearty full- bodied flavors of red pepper, espresso, chocolate, cedar, and earth.
